As a doctoral student in the [Miller Limb Lab](https://labs.feinberg.nrthwestern.ed/lee-miller/), I sudied proprioception (the internal sense of body position, movement, and forces) and how the brain processes this information. Now, I'm at the [SMILE Lab](https://smile.pitt.edu) at the University of Pittsburh, studying how the brain integrates this sensation with motor control for complex, feedback-driven tasks, like moving a full cup of coffee. 

Want to know more? Download [my CV](CV_Raeed_Chowdhury.pdf).
